title.rendered: Music Streaming and Digital Download Services

content.rendered:
Music streaming and digital download services are where most of your new fans find you. Or, at least, that’s where they consume your music outside of live shows.

Spotify, Amazon Music, iTunes, and SoundCloud

When your album or single releases, these are the services that measure success!

This list is an attempt to organize them all in one place.

It’s also a way for you to vote for your favorites and share your experience with each!

Digital downloads and streaming

Your Spotify stream counts, Amazon and Apple purchases, as well as your fan distribution in any place they want to hear your stuff builds your reputation as an artist.

If you’re a musician these guys help pay the bills, whether directly through revenues or by growing numbers at your shows by exposing you to new fans. In the music business, streaming and downloads are essential to getting signed deals and growing an audience.
